Vulcania illis

Pepperoni pizza

2020
  • Cooking

My last cooking project, and my first pizza. Pepperoni is characteristically soft, slightly smoky, and bright red in color. Thinly sliced pepperoni is a popular pizza topping in American pizzerias.
